arts.ttl: QPR boss Cifuentes explains Ronnie Edwards tactical switch against Leeds United
arts.sum: “The idea is to try and find solutions,” said Cifuentes when asked why he decided to play Edwards in midfield. In the last games I decided to pick Ronnie and [Steve] Cook to play together as the centre-halves but I think that Liam and Foxy deserve more minutes.

arts.ttl: QPR 2-2 Leeds: Jayden Bogle gives promotion focus
arts.sum: Leeds United will remain of the league heading into the international break, but were forced to come from two goals down to draw 2-2 at QPR. That came when Willy Gnonto flipped the game on its head off the bench, cutting open the R’s defence with a pass through to Dan James, whose deflected cut-back dropped to Jayden Bogle for 2-2.

arts.ttl: Leeds United boss Farke admits he made a mistake with Leeds star against QPR
arts.sum: Leeds United manager Daniel Farke admitted he may have set his team up differently in hindsight after their 2-2 draw with Queens Park Rangers on Saturday. Leeds found themselves 2-0 down inside 30 minutes, with Koki Saito’s stunning strike and Steve Cook’s unmarked header giving QPR a commanding early lead. The visitors, however, responded well […] The post Leeds United boss Farke admits he made a mistake with Leeds star against QPR appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: Leeds handed blow in their pursuit of 27-year-old wide player
arts.sum: Bright Osayi-Samuel has been linked with a move away from Turkish club Fenerbahce at the end of the season. The 27-year-old Nigerian right back will be out of contract in the summer and he has been linked with a move to Leeds United. The Championship outfit are looking to add more quality and depth to […] The post Leeds handed blow in their pursuit of 27-year-old wide player appeared first on CaughtOffside.

QPR’s losing run ended as they drew 2-2 with Leeds at Loftus Road, where the Championship leaders came back from two down. Here’s how we rated each Rangers player. Paul Nardi: 6 Unlucky when Jayden Bogle equalised by burying the loose ball after the Frenchman’s fine save. Jimmy Dunne: 8 Superb at right-back. Defended really […] The post QPR v Leeds player ratings appeared first on West London Sport.

arts.ttl: Leeds United handed new referee verdict after 'offside' goal controversy in QPR draw
arts.sum: Former Premier League referee Keith Hackett has praised Jayden Bogle for not getting involved in Leeds United's equaliser against Queens Park Rangers . The Whites had to settle for a 2-2 draw at Loftus Road, missing the chance to go seven points clear of the play-offs.

arts.ttl: Gnonto sends Leeds United message as Farke selection decision backfires vs QPR
arts.sum: A 2-2 draw denotes a good fightback away from home but there will still be jitters over the final eight games of the season given that is now one point from a possible six in their last two away games against lower-table opposition. Wilfried Gnonto came on for Aaronson at half-time, Farke admitting the American was disappointed in the dressing room having given the ball away for the first goal.

arts.ttl: Ending losing run ‘important emotionally’ for QPR – Cifuentes
arts.sum: Marti Cifuentes felt taking a point against Championship leaders Leeds was “important emotionally” for QPR following their recent losing run. The Yorkshire side came back from two down to secure a 2-2 draw at Loftus Road. But after four consecutive defeats, R’s boss Cifuentes felt the result was a much-needed morale boost. “It was very […] The post Ending losing run ‘important emotionally’ for QPR – Cifuentes appeared first on West London Sport.

arts.ttl: Leeds boss Farke admits he got team selection wrong against QPR
arts.sum: Leeds United boss Daniel Farke admitted he made a mistake by not selecting Ilia Gruev at QPR, where the Championship leaders came from back two down to secure a 2-2 draw. Farke considered starting with the defensive midfielder but instead opted for a more attacking approach. It backfired as goals from Koki Saito and Steve […] The post Leeds boss Farke admits he got team selection wrong against QPR appeared first on West London Sport.

arts.ttl: Leeds United suffer Championship automatic promotion blow as Burnley close gap
arts.sum: Before Burnley's game against Swansea, Leeds were in action at QPR. As the game wore on, Swansea started to create chances and should have pulled one back midway through the second half.
